alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 9:50AM CDT until March 18 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 949 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bayou La Batre, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Downtown Mobile, Tillmans Corner, Theodore, Spanish Fort, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Coden and I10 And I65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Alabama.
